<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="right">50</TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">iii </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>NINTH AMENDED AND RESTATED </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>LIMITED PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><SMALL>OF</SMALL> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>STEPSTONE
GROUP LP </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>NINTH AMENDED AND RESTATED LIMITED PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT</B> (the &#147;<B>Agreement</B>&#148;) of StepStone Group LP, a
Delaware limited partnership (the &#147;<B>Partnership</B>&#148;), is made and entered into as of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2021, by and between
StepStone Group Holdings LLC, as General Partner, and each of the persons admitted as a Limited Partner as of the date hereof or admitted from time to time after the date hereof as a Limited Partner in accordance with the terms of this Agreement
(collectively, the &#147;<B>Partners</B>&#148; with each being referred to separately as a &#147;<B>Partner</B>&#148;). </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">WHEREAS, since
September&nbsp;18, 2020, the Partnership has been governed by the Eighth Amended and Restated Agreement of Limited Partnership of the Partnership (the &#147;<B>Eighth Amended and Restated Agreement</B>&#148;); </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">WHEREAS, the Partners desire to document certain understandings set forth herein and to amend and restate the Eighth Amended and Restated
Agreement to read in its entirety as set forth herein. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein and for
other good and valuable consideration, the Partners hereby agree (and each Person who subsequently shall become a Partner shall agree) as follows: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:24pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>ORGANIZATIONAL MATTERS </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1.1 <U>Name</U>. The name of the Partnership is StepStone Group LP. The Partnership may also conduct business at the same time under one or
more fictitious names if the General Partner determines that such is in the best interests of the Partnership. The General Partner may change the name of the Partnership, from time to time, in accordance with applicable Law. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1.2 <U>Principal Place of Business; Other Places of Business</U>. The principal place of business of the Partnership is located at
4225&nbsp;Executive Square, Suite&nbsp;1600, La Jolla, CA&nbsp;92037 or such other place within or outside the State of Delaware as the General Partner may from time to time designate. The Partnership may maintain offices and places of business at
such other place or places within or outside the State of Delaware as the General Partner deems advisable. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1.3 <U>Business Purpose</U>.
The principal purpose of the Partnership is to engage in the business of providing private market and other alternative investment advisory services and engaging in and managing related investment activities. The Partnership may also engage in any
and all lawful business, purpose or activity in which a limited partnership may be engaged under applicable Law (including, without limitation, the Act) as may be determined by the General Partner from time to time. </P>
</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1.4 <U>Amendments to Certificate and Other Filings</U>. The General Partner may execute and
file any duly authorized amendments to the Certificate of Limited Partnership of the Partnership from time to time in a form prescribed by the Act. The General Partner shall also cause to be made, on behalf of the Partnership, such additional
filings and recordings as the General Partner shall deem necessary or advisable. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1.5 <U>Designated Agent for Service of Process</U>. The
address of the registered office of the Partnership in the State of Delaware, and the name and address of the registered agent of the Partnership for service of process on the Partnership in the State of Delaware, is The Corporation Trust Company,
Corporation Trust Center, 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, New Castle County, Delaware, 19801. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1.6 <U>Term</U>. The Partnership shall
continue until terminated pursuant to this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">1.7 <U>Rights</U>. The rights and liabilities of the Partners of the Partnership
shall be as provided in the Act, except as otherwise expressly provided herein. In the event of any inconsistency between any terms and conditions contained in this Agreement and any <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-mandatory</FONT> provisions
of the Act, the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement shall govern. The Partnership has been established as a series limited partnership pursuant to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">&#167;17-218</FONT> of the Act but no such series have
been or, in the absence of a properly adopted amendment to this Agreement, will be, issued. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>DEFINITIONS </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Capitalized
words and phrases used and not otherwise defined elsewhere in this Agreement shall have the following meanings: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.1 &#147;<B>2019
Dilutable Units</B>&#148; means Units outstanding immediately after the 2019 Equity Transaction, other than the Class&nbsp;B2 Units and Units acquired by 2019 Equity Investors pursuant to the 2019 Equity Transaction. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.2 &#147;<B>2019 Equity Investors</B>&#148; means the purchasers of Units in the 2019 Equity Transaction. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.3 &#147;<B>2019 Equity Transaction</B>&#148; means the purchases and sales of Units that occurred on August&nbsp;19, 2019. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.4 &#147;<B>2019 Redeemed Partners</B>&#148; means the Limited Partners whose Units were redeemed in the 2019 Equity Transaction. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.5 &#147;<B>Act</B>&#148; means the Delaware Revised Uniform Limited Partnership Act, as amended from time to time. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">2 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.6 &#147;<B>Active Partner</B>&#148; means a Class&nbsp;B Limited Partner or Class&nbsp;B2
Limited Partner employed by the SSG Group or actively engaged in a service provider capacity in the business or management of the SSG Group, for so long as there has not been a Termination Event with respect to such Limited Partner; <I>provided</I>
that, for the avoidance of doubt none of (i)&nbsp;Argonaut Holdings, LLC, (ii)&nbsp;Sanford Energy, Inc., (iii) Davis Investment Holdings, LLC, (iv)&nbsp;ALD 2020 GST Trust or (v)&nbsp;any holder of Partnership Interests that is owned by an advisory
fund or account advised or <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">sub-advised</FONT> by Davis Investment Holdings, LLC or one of its Affiliates shall be deemed Active Partners. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.7 &#147;<B>Additional Limited Partners</B>&#148; means those Persons admitted to the Partnership pursuant to
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.4</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.8 &#147;<B>Adjusted Capital Account Deficit</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Partner, the
deficit balance, if any, in such Partner&#146;s Capital Account as of the end of the relevant fiscal period, after giving effect to the following adjustments: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.8.1 Add to such Capital Account the following items: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) The amount, if any, that such Partner is obligated to contribute to the Partnership upon liquidation of such Partner&#146;s
Interest; and </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) The amount that such Partner is obligated to restore or is deemed to be obligated to restore pursuant to
Treas. Reg. &#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)(2)(ii)(</FONT><I>c</I>) or the penultimate sentence of each of Treas. Reg. &#167;&#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(g)(1)</FONT> and
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(i)(5);</FONT> and </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.8.2 Subtract from such Capital Account such Partner&#146;s share of the items
described in Treas. <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Reg.&nbsp;&#167;&#167;&nbsp;1.704-1(b)(2)(ii)(</FONT><I>d</I>)(<I>4</I>), (<I>5</I>) and (<I>6</I>). </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The foregoing definition of Adjusted Capital Account Deficit is intended to comply with the provisions of Treas.
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Reg.&nbsp;&#167;&nbsp;1.704-1(b)(2)(ii)(</FONT><I>d</I>) and shall be interpreted consistently therewith. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.9 &#147;<B>Adjustment Event</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Active Partner, any event the result of which is that such Limited
Partner&#146;s status as an Active Partner is Terminated for any reason. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.10 &#147;<B>Adjustment Percentage</B>&#148; is defined in
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.10.1</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.11 &#147;<B>Admission Agreement</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Limited Partner, the
purchase, subscription or other agreement pursuant to which such Limited Partner agrees to become a Limited Partner, or other written agreement between the General Partner and/or the Partnership on the one hand and such Limited Partner on the other
relating to such Limited Partner&#146;s interest in the Partnership. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.12 &#147;<B>Affected Partner</B>&#148; is defined in
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.10.1</U>. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">3 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.13 &#147;<B>Affiliate</B>&#148; means, with reference to a specified Person, any other
Person that, directly or indirectly, through one or more intermediaries, controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with, the specified Person. For purposes of this definition, the term &#147;control&#148; (including with correlative
meanings, the terms &#147;controlling&#148;, &#147;controlled by&#148;, and &#147;under common control with&#148;), with respect to any Person, means the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct or cause the direction of the
management and policies of such Person, either through the ownership of a majority of such Person&#146;s voting stock, by contract or otherwise. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.14 &#147;<B>Agreement</B>&#148; is defined in the Preamble and shall include any Class&nbsp;Designation, which shall be an integral part of
this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.15 &#147;<B>Anti-Dilution Trigger</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.12</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.16 &#147;<B>Anti-Dilution Units</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.12</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.17 &#147;<B>Arbitrator</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;9.2</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.18 &#147;<B>Assignee</B>&#148; means any Person (a)&nbsp;to whom a Limited Partner (or assignee thereof) Transfers all or any part of its
interest in the Partnership, and (b)&nbsp;which has not been admitted to the Partnership as a Substitute Partner pursuant to <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.6</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.19 &#147;<B>Assumed Tax Liability</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;4.2.2</U> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.20 &#147;<B>Assumed Tax Rate</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;4.2.2(b)</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.21 &#147;<B>Base Percentage Interest</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Partner as of any date of determination, the fraction (expressed as
a percentage), the numerator of which is the number of Units held by such Partner and the denominator of which is the number of Units held by all Partners. For purposes of this calculation, the Unvested Class&nbsp;B2 Units of any Class&nbsp;B2
Limited Partner shall be excluded (from both the numerator and the denominator). </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.22 &#147;<B>Beneficial Ownership</B>&#148; (including
correlative terms) shall have the meaning ascribed to that term in Rule <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">13d-3</FONT> promulgated under the Exchange Act. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.23 &#147;<B>Business Day</B>&#148; means any calendar day other than a Saturday, Sunday or other day on which commercial banks in New York,
New York are authorized or required to close. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.24 &#147;<B>Capital Account</B>&#148; is defined in Section&nbsp;3.2. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.25 &#147;<B>Capital Contributions</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Partner, the total amount of money and the initial Gross Asset Value
of property (other than money) contributed to the capital of the Partnership by such Partner, whether as an initial Capital Contribution or as an additional Capital Contribution. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.26 &#147;<B>Capital Stock</B>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;any class or series of capital stock of SSG now or hereafter authorized, (ii)&nbsp;any
rights, options, warrants, or convertible or exchangeable securities that entitle the holder thereof to subscribe for or purchase, convert such securities into, or exchange such securities for, capital stock of SSG, and (iii)&nbsp;any indebtedness
issued by SSG that provides any of the rights described in clause (ii). </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">4 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.27 &#147;<B>Cause</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Active Partner or, with respect to
Section&nbsp;7.8.2(e) only, any Class&nbsp;C Limited Partner, that such Limited Partner commits any of the following acts and fails to cure said breach, if it is in fact curable, within thirty (30)&nbsp;days after written notice from the General
Partner of said breach: (a)&nbsp;conviction of, or plea of guilty or nolo contendere to, any criminal act involving moral turpitude, including, without limitation, fraud, embezzlement or misappropriation of funds or property; (b)&nbsp;commission of
a material act of dishonesty, fraud or misrepresentation which would reasonably be expected to adversely and materially affect the assets, business or prospects of the SSG Group; (c)&nbsp;willful breach of duty in the course of providing services as
an Active Partner; (d)&nbsp;material breach of this Agreement; and/or (e)&nbsp;materially failing to satisfy, perform or comply with any obligations, duties or undertakings that a Limited Partner owes to the SSG Group. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.28 &#147;<B>Change of Control</B>&#148; means: (i)&nbsp;an acquisition by any Person or group of Persons of Equity Securities of the
Partnership (other than the Ownership Group, the SSG Group or a member of either of them), whether already outstanding or newly issued, in a transaction or series of transactions, if immediately thereafter such Person or group of Persons (other than
the Ownership Group, the SSG Group or a member of either of them) has, or would have, directly or indirectly, Beneficial Ownership of fifty percent (50%) or more of the combined Equity Securities of the Partnership; (ii)&nbsp;the sale of all or
substantially all of the assets of the Partnership and its Subsidiaries, taken as a whole, directly or indirectly, to any Person or group of Persons (other than the Ownership Group, the SSG Group or a member of either of them) in a transaction or
series of transactions; or (iii)&nbsp;the consummation of a tender offer, merger, recapitalization, consolidation, business combination, reorganization or other transaction, or series of related transactions, involving the Partnership and any other
Person or group of Persons (other than the Ownership Group, the SSG Group or a member of either of them); unless, in the case of clause (ii)&nbsp;or (iii)&nbsp;of this definition, either (1)&nbsp;then-existing Partners, immediately prior to such
transaction or the first transaction in such series of transactions, will Beneficially Own more than fifty percent (50%) of the combined Equity Securities of the Partnership (or, if the Partnership will not be the surviving entity in such
transaction or series of transactions, such surviving entity) immediately after such transaction or series of transactions or (2)&nbsp;Persons who are Partners immediately prior to such transaction or the first transaction in such series of
transactions will be entitled to cast at least a majority of the votes for the Board of Directors of SSG (or the board of directors or equivalent body of such surviving entity, as the case may be) after the closing of such transaction or series of
transactions. As used in this definition of Change of Control, the term &#147;group&#148; shall have the same meaning of such term is used in Rule <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">13d-5</FONT> of the Exchange Act. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.29 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;A Common Stock</B>&#148; means the Class&nbsp;A common stock of SSG. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.30 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;A Units</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.1(a)</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.31 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B Common Stock</B>&#148; means the Class&nbsp;B common stock of SSG. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.32 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B Exchange Agreement</B>&#148; means the Exchange Agreement, effective as of September&nbsp;18, 2020,
among the Partnership and the holders of Class&nbsp;B Units (as defined therein) from time to time party thereto, as the same may be amended, modified, supplemented or restated from time to time. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">5 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.33 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B Limited Partner</B>&#148; means a Limited Partner
in its capacity as a holder of Class&nbsp;B Units. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.34 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B Units</B>&#148; is defined in
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.1(b)</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.35 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Dilution Reserve</B>&#148; means that portion of the
purchase price paid by the 2019 Equity Investors in the 2019 Equity Transaction retained by the Partnership to fund distributions under <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;4.4</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.36 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Forfeiture Amount</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;4.4.2</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.37 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Limited Partner</B>&#148; means a Limited Partner in its capacity as a holder of Class&nbsp;B2 Units.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.38 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Units</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.1(c).</U> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.39 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Vesting Amount</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;4.4.2</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.40 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;C Exchange Agreement</B>&#148; means the Class&nbsp;C Exchange Agreement, effective on or about the date
of this Agreement, among the Partnership and the Partnership Unitholders (as defined therein) from time to time party thereto, as the same may be amended, modified, supplemented or restated from time to time. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.41 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;C Limited Partner</B>&#148; means a Limited Partner in its capacity as a holder of Class&nbsp;C Units.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.42 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;C Units</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.1(d)</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.43 &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;Designation</B>&#148; means any document setting forth the rights, obligations, terms and conditions of
the Units of any other class established by the General Partner in accordance with this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.44 &#147;<B>Code</B>&#148; means the
Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time (or any corresponding provisions of succeeding law). </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.45
&#147;<B>Death</B>&#148; means the death of a natural person that is an Active Partner, or the death of a natural person with respect to whom an estate planning vehicle is an Active Partner. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.46 &#147;<B>Depreciation</B>&#148; for each Fiscal Year or other applicable period, an amount equal to the federal income tax depreciation,
amortization or other cost recovery deduction allowable under United States federal income tax principles with respect to an asset for Fiscal Year or other period, except that if the Gross Asset Value of an asset differs from its adjusted basis for
federal income tax purposes at the beginning of such year or period, Depreciation shall be computed in accordance with Treas. Reg. &#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)(2)(iv)(</FONT><I>g</I>)(<I>3</I>) or
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-3(d)(2),</FONT> as applicable, as determined by the General Partner. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.47 &#147;<B>Designated
Individual</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.8.1(b)</U>. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">6 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.48 &#147;<B>Distribution Record Date</B>&#148; means the record date established by the
Partnership for the purpose of determining the Partners entitled to receive any distribution, which record date shall (unless otherwise determined by the Partnership) generally be the same as the record date established by SSG for a distribution to
its stockholders of some or all of its portion of such distribution. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.49 &#147;<B>Drag-Along Right</B>&#148; is defined in
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.9.2</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.50 &#147;<B>Drag-Along Transaction</B>&#148; means a sale of all or substantially all of the
consolidated business, operations and assets of the SSG Group in one transaction or a series of related transactions that (a)&nbsp;would result in a Change of Control and (b)&nbsp;is designated as a Drag-Along Transaction by the General Partner or
the Board of Directors of SSG. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.51 &#147;<B>Equity Securities</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any and all partnership
interests, capital stock, options or other equity securities in such Person, and all securities exchangeable for or convertible or exercisable into, any of the foregoing. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.52 &#147;<B>Equivalent Units</B>&#148; means, with respect to any class or series of Capital Stock, Units with preferences, conversion, and
other rights (other than voting rights), restrictions, limitations as to dividends and other distributions, qualifications and terms and conditions of redemption that are substantially the same as (or correspond to) the preferences, conversion and
other rights, restrictions, limitations as to distributions, qualifications and terms and conditions of redemption of such Capital Stock as appropriate to reflect the relative rights and preferences of such Capital Stock as to the other classes and
series of Capital Stock as such Equivalent Units would have as to the other classes and series of Units corresponding to the other classes of Capital Stock, but not as to matters such as voting for members of the Board of Directors that are not
applicable to the Partnership. In comparing the economic rights of any Capital Stock with the economic rights of any Units, the effect of taxes shall be taken into account. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.53 &#147;<B>Exchange Act</B>&#148; means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.54 &#147;<B>FATCA</B>&#148; means Code sections 1471 through 1474, as of the date of this Agreement (or any amended or successor version that
is substantively comparable and not materially more onerous to comply with), any current or future regulations or official interpretations, any agreement entered into pursuant to Code section 1471(b)(1), any applicable intergovernmental agreements
with respect thereto, and any fiscal or regulatory legislation, rules or practices adopted pursuant to any such intergovernmental agreement entered into in connection with the implementation of such sections of the Code. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.55 &#147;<B>Fiscal Year</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;10.3</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.56 &#147;<B>Former Active Partner</B>&#148; means a Person who previously was an Active Partner, from and after a Termination Event with
respect to such Limited Partner. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.57 &#147;<B>Full Vesting Date</B>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any Class&nbsp;B2 Units, the date
on which all of the Class&nbsp;B2 Units issued to a Class&nbsp;B2 Limited Partner in an Admission Agreement become fully vested in accordance with the terms set forth in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.11.1</U>. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">7 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.58 &#147;<B>General Partner</B>&#148; means StepStone Group Holdings LLC, a Delaware
limited liability company, or any other Person that becomes a successor or an additional general partner of the Partnership as provided in this Agreement, in each such Person&#146;s capacity as general partner, in each case as the context requires.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.59 &#147;<B>Gross Asset Value</B>&#148; means, with respect to any asset, the asset&#146;s adjusted basis for federal income tax
purposes, except as follows: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.59.1 The initial Gross Asset Value of any asset (other than money) contributed by a Partner to the
Partnership shall be the gross fair market value of such asset. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.59.2 The Gross Asset Values of all assets shall be adjusted to equal
their respective gross fair market values as determined by the General Partner as of the following times: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) the
acquisition of an additional interest in the Partnership (other than in connection with the execution of this Agreement) by a new or existing Partner in exchange for more than a <I>de minimis</I> Capital Contribution, if the General Partner
reasonably determines that such adjustment is necessary or appropriate to reflect the relative economic interests of the Partners in the Partnership; </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) the distribution by the Partnership to a Partner of more than a <I>de minimis</I> amount of Partnership assets as
consideration for an interest in the Partnership, if the General Partner reasonably determines that such adjustment is necessary or appropriate to reflect the relative economic interests of the Partners in the Partnership; </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) the grant of an interest in the Partnership (other than a <I>de minimis </I>amount) as consideration for the provision of
services to or for the benefit of the Partnership by an existing Partner acting in a Partner capacity, or by a new Partner acting in a Partner capacity or in anticipation of being a Partner; </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) the liquidation of the Partnership within the meaning of Treas. Reg. &#167;
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)(2)(ii)(</FONT><I>g</I>); and </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e) such other times as the General Partner shall
reasonably determine necessary or advisable in order to comply with Treas. Reg. &#167;&#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)</FONT> and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2.</FONT> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.1.2 The Gross Asset Value of any Partnership asset distributed to a Partner shall be the gross fair market value of&nbsp;such asset on the
date of distribution, as determined by the General Partner. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.1.3 The Gross Asset Values of Partnership assets shall be increased (or
decreased) to reflect any adjustments to the adjusted basis of such assets pursuant to Code section 734(b) or Code section 743(b), but only to the extent that such adjustments are taken into account in determining Capital Accounts pursuant to Treas.
Reg. &#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)(2)(iv)(</FONT><I>m</I>); <I>provided</I>, <I>however</I>, that Gross Asset Values shall not be adjusted pursuant to this <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.4</U> to the extent that the General
Partner reasonably determines that an adjustment pursuant to <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.2</U> above is necessary or appropriate in connection with a transaction that would otherwise result in an adjustment pursuant to this
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.4</U>. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">8 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.1.4 If the Gross Asset Value of a Partnership asset has been determined or adjusted
pursuant to <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.1</U>, <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.2</U> or <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.4</U>, such Gross Asset Value shall thereafter be adjusted by the Depreciation taken into account with respect to
such Partnership asset for purposes of computing Net Profits and Net Losses. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.60 &#147;<B>Imputed Underpayment</B>&#148; is defined in
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.9.1</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.61 &#147;<B>Imputed Underpayment Share</B>&#148; is defined in
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.9.2</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.62 &#147;<B>Incapacity</B>&#148; means the entry of an order of incompetence or of insanity, or
the Death, permanent disability, dissolution, bankruptcy (as defined in the Act) or termination (other than by merger or consolidation) of any Person. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.63 &#147;<B>Indemnitees</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;6.3.3</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.64 &#147;<B>Initial Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Amount</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;4.4.2</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.65 &#147;<B>Intangible Asset Gain</B>&#148; means the gain realized by the Partnership with respect to any Intangible Assets in connection
with the actual or hypothetical sale of such Intangible Assets, including, but not limited to, gain realized in connection with an adjustment to the Gross Asset Value of Partnership assets. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.66 &#147;<B>Intangible Assets</B>&#148; means the assets of the Partnership that are of the type described in Code section 197(d), as well as
interests in entities classified as corporations for U.S. federal income tax purposes. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.67 &#147;<B>Investment Company Act</B>&#148;
means the Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.68 &#147;<B>IRS</B>&#148; means the United States Internal Revenue Service, or, if
applicable, a state or local taxing agency. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.69 &#147;<B>Issuance Date</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Class&nbsp;B2 Units, the date
of issuance of such Class&nbsp;B2 Units pursuant to an Admission Agreement or such other date as determined by the General Partner and set forth in the relevant Admission Agreement. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.70 &#147;<B>JAMS</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;9.1</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.71 &#147;<B>JAMS Rules</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;9.1</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.72 &#147;<B>Law</B>&#148; means any applicable constitutional provision, statute, act, code (including the Code), law, regulation, rule,
ordinance, order, decree, ruling, proclamation, resolution, judgment, decision, declaration, or interpretative or advisory opinion or letter of a governmental authority and shall include, for the avoidance of any doubt, the Act. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">9 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.73 &#147;<B>Limited Partner</B>&#148; means, at any time, any Person who is at such time a
limited partner of the Partnership and shown as such on the books and records of the Partnership, in its capacity as a limited partner of the Partnership. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.74 &#147;<B>Liquidator</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;8.5.1</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75 &#147;<B>Net Profits</B>&#148; or &#147;<B>Net Losses</B>&#148; means, for each Fiscal Year, an amount equal to the Partnership&#146;s
taxable income or loss for such Fiscal Year determined in accordance with Code section 703(a) (for this purpose, all items of income, gain, loss, deduction or credit required to be stated separately pursuant to Code section 703(a)(1) shall be
included in taxable income or loss), with the following adjustments: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75.1 Any income of the Partnership that is exempt from federal
income tax and not otherwise taken into account in computing Net Profits or Net Losses pursuant to this Section&nbsp;2.74 shall be added to such taxable income or loss; </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75.2 Any expenditure of the Partnership described in Code section 705(a)(2)(B) or treated as Code section 705(a)(2)(B) expenditures pursuant
to Treas. Reg. &#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)(2)(iv)(</FONT><I>i</I>), and not otherwise taken into account in computing Net Profits or Net Losses pursuant to this <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.74</U>, shall be subtracted from
such taxable income or loss; </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75.3 Gain or loss resulting from any disposition of any asset of the Partnership with respect to which gain
or loss is recognized for federal income tax purposes shall be computed by reference to the Gross Asset Value of the asset disposed of, notwithstanding that the adjusted tax basis of such asset differs from its Gross Asset Value; </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75.4 In lieu of the depreciation, amortization and other cost recovery deductions taken into account in computing such taxable income or
loss, there shall be taken into account Depreciation for such Fiscal Year; </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75.5 If the Gross Asset Value of any asset owned by the
Partnership is adjusted in accordance with <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.2</U> or <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.56.3</U>, the amount of such adjustment shall be taken into account in the taxable year of such adjustment as gain or loss from
the disposition of such asset for purposes of computing Net Profits or Net Losses; </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75.6 to the extent an adjustment to the adjusted tax
basis of any asset of the Partnership pursuant to Code section&nbsp;734(b) is required pursuant to Treas. Reg. &#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)(2)(iv)(m)(4)</FONT> to be taken into account in determining Capital Accounts as a
result of a distribution other than in liquidation of a Partner&#146;s interest in the Partnership, the amount of such adjustment shall be treated as an item of gain (if the adjustment increases the basis of the asset) or loss (if the adjustment
decreases the basis of the asset) from the disposition of the asset and shall be taken into account for purposes of computing Net Profits and Net Losses; and </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.75.7 Notwithstanding any other provision of this <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;2.74</U>, any items that are allocated pursuant to
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.2</U> or <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.3.2</U> shall not be taken into account in computing Net Profits or Net Losses. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">10 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.76 &#147;<B>Nonrecourse Deductions</B>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Treas. Reg.
&#167;&#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(b)(1)</FONT> and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(c).</FONT> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.77
&#147;<B>Nonrecourse Liability</B>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Treas. Reg. &#167;&#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(b)(3)</FONT> and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.752-1(a)(2).</FONT> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.78 &#147;<B>Ownership Group</B>&#148; means Persons who, at the applicable time, are parties to the Stockholders&#146; Agreement. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.79 &#147;<B>Partner Nonrecourse Debt</B>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Treas. Reg. &#167;
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(b)(4)</FONT> for the phrase &#147;partner nonrecourse debt.&#148; </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.80 &#147;<B>Partner
Nonrecourse Debt Minimum Gain</B>&#148; means an amount, with respect to each Partner Nonrecourse Debt, equal to Partnership Minimum Gain that would result if such Partner Nonrecourse Debt were treated as a nonrecourse liability (within the meaning
of Treas. Reg. <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">&#167;&nbsp;1.752-1(a)(2)),</FONT> determined in accordance with Treas. Reg. <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">&#167;&nbsp;1.704-2(i)(3).</FONT> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.81 &#147;<B>Partner Nonrecourse Deductions</B>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Treas. Reg. &#167;
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(i)</FONT> for the phrase &#147;partner nonrecourse deductions.&#148; </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.82
&#147;<B>Partners</B>&#148; is defined in the Preamble. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.83 &#147;<B>Partnership</B>&#148; is defined in the Preamble. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.84 &#147;<B>Partnership Information</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;6.4.3</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.85 &#147;<B>Partnership Interest</B>&#148; or &#147;<B>Interest</B>&#148; means the interest or Units of a Partner in the Partnership at any
particular time. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.86 &#147;<B>Partnership Minimum Gain</B>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Treas. Reg. &#167;&#167; <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(b)(2)</FONT> and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-2(d)(1)</FONT> for the phrase &#147;partnership minimum gain.&#148; </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.87 &#147;<B>Person</B>&#148; means and includes an individual, a corporation, a partnership, a limited liability company, a trust, an estate,
an unincorporated organization, a government or any department or agency thereof, or any entity similar to any of the foregoing. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.88
&#147;<B>Proxy</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.5</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.89 &#147;<B>Push Out Election</B>&#148; means the election
under Code section 6226 (or any similar provision of state or local law) to &#147;push out&#148; an adjustment to the Partners or former Partners, including filing IRS Form 8988 (Election for Alternative to Payment of the Imputed Underpayment), or
any successor or similar form, and taking any other action necessary to give effect to such election. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.90 &#147;<B>Qualified
Transfer</B>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;with respect to a Limited Partner that is a Person other than an individual, the sale or transfer of Units by a Limited Partner to an Affiliate of such Limited Partner or to another Person who is a Limited Partner
(or an Affiliate thereof) as of the date of the Qualified Transfer, or (b)&nbsp;with respect to a Limited Partner that is an individual, </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">11 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
(i)&nbsp;transfers to ancestors, descendants or the spouse of a Limited Partner or to a trust for the benefit of the Limited Partner or members of the Limited Partner&#146;s immediate family of
which the Limited Partner is a trustee, or (ii)&nbsp;transfers to any Person pursuant to testate or intestate succession, <I>provided</I>, that in each case (whether pursuant to clause (a)&nbsp;or (b)), (x)&nbsp;the transferee agrees to be bound by
the terms and conditions of this Agreement with respect to the securities acquired by such transferee and (y)&nbsp;the transfer is effected in a transaction that is exempt from the registration and qualification requirements of the Securities Act
and applicable state securities laws. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.91 &#147;<B>Registration Rights Agreement</B>&#148; means the Registration Rights Agreement,
effective on or about the date hereof, among SSG and the other persons party thereto, as the same may be amended, modified, supplemented or restated from time to time. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.92 &#147;<B>Regulations</B>&#148; means proposed, temporary and final Treasury regulations promulgated under the Code, as such regulations
may be amended from time to time (including corresponding provisions of succeeding Treasury regulations). References to &#147;Treas. Reg. &#167;&#148; are to sections of the Regulations. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.93 &#147;<B>Regulatory Allocations</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.2.9</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.94 &#147;<B>Restrictive Covenant Agreement</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Limited Partner, the Restrictive Covenant Agreement,
employment agreement or other agreement (if any) (including the Transaction Agreement, with respect to the Class&nbsp;C Limited Partners) between such Limited Partner (or its Designated Individual) and the Partnership or an Affiliate, to the extent
such agreement provides for any undertakings on the part of such Limited Partner or Designated Individual relating to <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-competition</FONT> with and/or <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-solicitation</FONT> of
clients or employees of the Partnership or any Affiliate. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.95 &#147;<B>Retirement</B>&#148; means, with respect to an Active Partner, the
conclusion of such person&#146;s status as an Active Partner as a result of resignation or involuntary termination other than for Cause, in the event that as of the Termination Date, the sum of (a)&nbsp;the number of such Active Partner&#146;s years
of age (which shall be at least 50) plus (b)&nbsp;the number of such Active Partner&#146;s years as an Active Partner (which shall be at least 15) is equal to at least seventy (70). </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.96 &#147;<B>Safe Harbor Election</B>&#148; is defined in Section&nbsp;3.3.5(h). </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.97 &#147;<B>SCAI</B>&#148; means Swiss Capital Alternative Investments AG, a private company limited by shares incorporated in the canton of
Zurich. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.98 &#147;<B>SCAI Shareholders&#146; Agreement</B>&#148; means the Shareholders&#146; Agreement made on December&nbsp;2, 2016
between SCP, SCAI and the Partnership. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.99 &#147;<B>SCP</B>&#148; means SC Partner LP, a Cayman Islands exempted limited partnership that
is party to the SCP Framework Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.100 &#147;<B>SCP Framework Agreement</B>&#148; means the Framework Agreement made on
May&nbsp;11, 2016 between the Partnership, the General Partner, SCAI and SCP. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">12 </P>

</DIV></Center>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.101 &#147;<B>SCP LPA</B>&#148; means the Limited Partnership Agreement of SCP made on
December&nbsp;2, 2016. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.102 &#147;<B>SCP Partner</B>&#148; means each of the limited partners of SCP and any transferee of any such
partner permitted under the SCAI Shareholders Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.103 &#147;<B>Side Letter</B>&#148; is defined in
<U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;10.4</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.104 &#147;<B>SSG</B>&#148; means StepStone Group Inc., a Delaware corporation, or its
successors. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.105 &#147;<B>SSG Group</B>&#148; means SSG and its Affiliates, including the Partnership. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.106 &#147;<B>Start Date</B>&#148; means with respect to any Class&nbsp;B Limited Partner, the date of commencement of such Active
Partner&#146;s status as an Active Partner or such other date established for purposes of any vesting provisions in such Partner&#146;s Admission Agreement. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.107 &#147;<B>Stockholders&#146; Agreement</B>&#148; means the Amended and Restated Stockholders&#146; Agreement, effective on or about the
date hereof, among SSG, the Partnership and the other Persons party thereto, as the same may be amended, modified, supplemented or restated from time to time. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.108 &#147;<B>Subsidiary</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any corporation or other entity of which a majority of (i)&nbsp;the
voting power of the voting equity securities or (ii)&nbsp;the outstanding equity interests is owned, directly or indirectly, by such Person. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.109 &#147;<B>Substitute Partner</B>&#148; means any Person (a)&nbsp;to whom a Limited Partner (or assignee thereof) Transfers all or any part
of its interest in the Partnership, and (b)&nbsp;which has been admitted to the Partnership as a Substitute Partner pursuant to <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.6</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.110 &#147;<B>Target Balance</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.2.10</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.111 &#147;<B>Tax Distribution</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;4.2.1</U> </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.112 &#147;<B>Tax Items</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;5.3.1</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.113 &#147;<B>Tax Receivable Agreements</B>&#148; means the Tax Receivable Agreement (Exchanges) and the Tax Receivable Agreement
(Reorganizations), in each case effective on or about the date hereof, among SSG, the Partnership and the other parties thereto, as the same may be amended, modified, supplemented or restated from time to time. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.114 &#147;<B>Tax Representative</B>&#148; means, as applicable, (a)&nbsp;the Partner or other Person (including the Partnership) designated
as the &#147;partnership representative&#148; of the Partnership under Code section 6223, (b) the Partner designated as the &#147;tax matters partner&#148; for the Partnership under Code section 6231(a)(7) (as in effect before 2018 and before
amendment by Title XI of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2015, H.R. 1314, Public Law <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">No.&nbsp;114-74),</FONT> and/or (c)&nbsp;the Partner or other Person serving in a similar capacity under any similar provisions of
state, local or <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-U.S.</FONT> Laws, in each case, acting solely at the direction of the General Partner to the maximum extent permitted under applicable Law. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">13 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.115 &#147;<B>Termination</B>&#148; means, with respect to an Active Partner of the
Partnership or, with respect to Section&nbsp;7.8.2(e) only, any Class&nbsp;C Limited Partner, such partner ceasing to provide substantive services to the SSG Group for any reason, including, without limitation, as a result of resignation,
termination (whether or not for Cause), or Retirement. &#147;<B>Terminate</B>&#148; and &#147;<B>Terminated</B>&#148; shall have a correlative meaning. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.116 &#147;<B>Termination Date</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Active Partner, the date of the Termination Event with respect to such
Active Partner. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.117 &#147;<B>Termination Event</B>&#148; means, with respect to any Active Partner, the first to occur of: (a)&nbsp;the
termination of the Partnership, or (b)&nbsp;such Active Partner&#146;s Termination. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.118 &#147;<B>Termination Without Cause</B>&#148;
means, with respect to an Active Partner, the conclusion of such person&#146;s status as an Active Partner as a result of involuntary termination other than for Cause. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.119 &#147;<B>Transaction Agreement</B>&#148; means that certain Transaction Agreement, dated as of July&nbsp;7, 2021, by and among the
Partnership, SSG, certain holders of Class&nbsp;C Units and certain other parties as set forth therein. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.120 &#147;<B>Transfer</B>&#148;,
including correlative terms, means, with respect to any Limited Partner or Assignee, any sale, conveyance, exchange, assignment, pledge, encumbrance, gift, bequest, hypothecation or other transfer or disposition by any other means, of any or all of
such Limited Partner&#146;s Units (or an Assignee&#146;s economic interest in the Partnership), whether for value or no value and whether directly or indirectly, voluntary or involuntary (including, without limitation, by operation of law), or an
agreement to do any of the foregoing. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.121 &#147;<B>Units</B>&#148; is defined in <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.1</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.122 &#147;<B>Unvested Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Units</B>&#148; means any Class&nbsp;B2 Units that have not vested in accordance with the
provisions of <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.11.1</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.123 &#147;<B>Vested Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Units</B>&#148; means any
Class&nbsp;B2 Units (or portion thereof) that have vested in accordance with the provisions of <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.11.1</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">2.124 &#147;<B>Vested Quarter</B>&#148; means each of the successive three (3)-month periods during which a Limited Partner is an Active
Partner for the entirety of such period, without proration. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>CAPITAL; CAPITAL ACCOUNTS AND PARTNERS </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.1 <U>Capital Contributions</U>. Except as expressly provided herein with respect to SSG or in the Class&nbsp;B Exchange Agreement,
(i)&nbsp;no Partner shall be required to make any Capital Contributions to the Partnership without such Partner&#146;s consent and (ii)&nbsp;no Partner shall be permitted to make any Capital Contributions to the Partnership without the General
Partner&#146;s consent. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">14 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.2 <U>Capital Accounts</U>. A Capital Account shall be established and maintained for each
Partner in accordance with Treas. Reg. &#167; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">1.704-1(b)(2)(iv)</FONT> (a &#147;<B>Capital Account</B>&#148;). </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.3 <U>Classes of Units</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.3.1 Upon effectiveness of this Agreement, the Interests of Limited Partners are represented by units of Partnership Interest
(&#147;<B>Units</B>&#148;), which are divided into: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Class&nbsp;A Units (the &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;A
Units</B>&#148;), which are issuable to SSG and such other Persons as the General Partner shall determine; </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b)
Class&nbsp;B Units (the &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B Units</B>&#148;), which shall be issued only (x)&nbsp;in accordance with <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.4</U>, and (y)&nbsp;with respect to and upon full vesting of Class&nbsp;B2 Units;
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Class&nbsp;B2 Units (the &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;B2 Units</B>&#148;), none of which shall be issued after
the date hereof; and </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) Class&nbsp;C Units (the &#147;<B>Class</B><B></B><B>&nbsp;C Units</B>&#148;), which have been
issued as consideration to certain of the Sellers (as defined in the Transaction Agreement) pursuant to the Transaction Agreement and shall be issued only in accordance with <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.4</U>. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.3.2 The General Partner is authorized to establish and designate additional classes and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">sub-classes</FONT>
of Units, including preferred Units that rank senior to any then-existing Units and any other new class of Units whose rights, obligations, terms and conditions are set forth on a Class&nbsp;Designation. The General Partner may establish and
determine the designations, priorities, powers, preferences, limitations and relative rights of any additional class or classes of Partnership Interests. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.3.3 The Partnership may issue additional Units in exchange for cash or other consideration, including additional classes of Units, to such
Persons, at such times, and having such terms as the General Partner may determine in accordance with this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.3.4 <U>Units and
Capital Stock of SSG</U>. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Each Class&nbsp;B Unit shall be associated with and stapled to one share of Class&nbsp;B
Common Stock. Upon any issuance of Class&nbsp;B Units, each Limited Partner receiving such Units shall purchase from SSG, concurrently with the issuance of Class&nbsp;B Units, one share of Class&nbsp;B Common Stock for the consideration of the par
value thereof. Upon any surrender, redemption or conversion of any such Class&nbsp;B Unit, the holder thereof shall concurrently surrender to SSG or the Partnership (as applicable) the associated share of Class&nbsp;B Common Stock in exchange for
payment by SSG or the Partnership (as applicable) of the par value thereof. Without the specific approval of the General Partner, no Transfer of a Class&nbsp;B Unit shall be effected without a simultaneous Transfer of the corresponding share of
Class&nbsp;B Common Stock. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">15 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Class&nbsp;A Units may be issued only in accordance with <U>Sections
3.3.4(c)</U> and <U>(f)</U>&nbsp;and no additional Class&nbsp;B Units, Class&nbsp;B2 Units or Class&nbsp;C Units may be issued by the Partnership except in accordance with <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.4(f)</U> below. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) If SSG issues shares of Class&nbsp;A Common Stock (other than an issuance pursuant to the Class&nbsp;B Exchange Agreement,
the Class&nbsp;C Exchange Agreement or the Transaction Agreement), unless such net proceeds are used to purchase Units from Limited Partners, SSG shall promptly contribute to the Partnership all the net proceeds and property (if any) received by SSG
with respect to such Class&nbsp;A Common Stock. Upon the contribution by SSG to the Partnership of all (but not less than all) of such net proceeds and property (if any) so received by SSG, the General Partner shall cause the Partnership to issue a
number of Class&nbsp;A Units equal to the number of shares of Class&nbsp;A Common Stock so issued, registered in the name of SSG, such that, at all times, the number of Class&nbsp;A Units held by SSG equals the number of outstanding shares of
Class&nbsp;A Common Stock. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) It is the intent that each unit of Capital Stock be generally equivalent in economic
respects to an Equivalent Unit. Accordingly, if SSG issues shares of Capital Stock other than Class&nbsp;A Common Stock, SSG shall promptly contribute to the Partnership all the net proceeds and property (if any) received by SSG with respect to such
Capital Stock. Upon the contribution by SSG to the Partnership of all (but not less than all) of such net proceeds and property (if any) so received by SSG, the General Partner shall cause the Partnership to issue a number of Equivalent Units equal
to the number of shares of Capital Stock so issued, registered in the name of SSG, such that, at all times, the number of relevant class of Equivalent Units held by SSG equals the number of outstanding shares of the relevant class of Capital Stock.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e) If, at any time, any shares of Capital Stock are repurchased (whether by exercise of a put or call, pursuant to an
open market purchase, automatically or by means of another arrangement) by SSG for cash or other consideration, then the General Partner shall cause the Partnership, immediately prior to such repurchase of such Capital Stock, to redeem an equal
number of Equivalent Units held by SSG, at an aggregate redemption price equal to the aggregate purchase price of the Capital Stock being repurchased by SSG (plus any expenses related thereto) and upon such other terms as are the same for the
Capital Stock being cancelled or retired by SSG. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(f) Any subdivision (by stock split, stock dividend, reclassification,
recapitalization or otherwise) or combination (by reverse stock split, reclassification, recapitalization or otherwise) of a class of Capital Stock shall be accompanied by an identical subdivision or combination of the Equivalent Units to maintain
at all times a <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">one-to-one</FONT></FONT> ratio between the number of Equivalent Units and the number of outstanding shares of the applicable class of Capital Stock. Any corrective
action to maintain such ratios shall not be subject to a corresponding adjustment that would render the corrective action ineffective. In the implementation and administration of this <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;3.3.4</U>, the General Partner
shall have authority to amend this Agreement without the consent of any Limited Partner and shall have discretion to make such adjustments as it determines in good faith to be appropriate to reflect the economic equivalency intended hereby. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">16 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always">
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">3.3.5 <U>Class</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;B2 Units</U>. The Partnership has established the
Class&nbsp;B2 Units which were issued to Active Partners as compensation for services rendered or to be rendered to or for the benefit of the Partnership or its Affiliates. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) The Class&nbsp;B2 Units are subject to the limitations on distributions contained in <U>Sections 4.3</U> and <U>4.4</U>.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Each Class&nbsp;B2 Limited Partner shall have an initial Base Percentage Interest with respect to its Class&nbsp;B2
Units of zero percent (0%) and such Base Percentage Interest shall increase as its Class&nbsp;B2 Units vest in accordance with <U>Section</U><U></U><U>&nbsp;7.11.1</U>; <I>provided</I>, that for the avoidance of doubt, for purposes of
